item.title: Kathy Bates, Still Badass: The Icon on ‘Matlock,’ Saying ‘F– You’ to Weight Loss Critics and Why Being an Old Emmy Nominee Is a ‘Badge of Honor’
item.description: When it comes to describing his onetime co-star Kathy Bates, Sam Rockwell doesn’t hold back. “She’s a badass motherfucker,” he says about his time working with her on Clint Eas

item.title: Norman Lear Awards to Honor ‘The Pitt,’ ‘Dying for Sex,’ ‘Shrinking’ and More
item.description: The accolades, formerly titled the Sentinel Awards, from the Hollywood, Health & Society program at USC Annenberg’s Norman Lear Center, will be presented in October.

item.title: Norman Lear Awards to Honor ‘The Pitt,’ ‘Dying for Sex,’ ‘Shrinking’ and More

item.title: Emmy Anomalies: Their Shows Were Snubbed, But They Weren’t
item.description: Nearly a dozen of this year’s acting nominees were from series that were otherwise completely shut out.

item.title: Watson Moves onto CBS’ Fall Lineup, ‘FBI’ Spinoff ‘CIA’ Pushed to Midseason
item.description: The network has also set its fall premiere dates, with the bulk of the schedule rolling out in October.
